text: You don’t need an ice cream maker for this strawberry-coconut ice cream cake. Whipped cream, coconut milk and a touch of vodka help keep the mixture from forming ice crystals. https://t.co/9AJ8zWMaz7

name: nytimes
text: “We gave up, but her hair didn’t. Strands of beautiful silver hair clung to my clothes, car, sheets. Mocking and reminding me of who I was losing. After many sessions of individual and couples counseling, we re-emerged, together.” — Darrell Hill https://t.co/vZMSZdLbIS

name: nytimes
text: Shakespeare in the Park and other outdoor theater venues are shut. But for performers and directors, open-air memories are as sharp as the bite of a mosquito. https://t.co/nLs6WYNCuz

text: Destinations around the globe are desperate to revive tourism. But even those offering incentives are reluctant to include Americans on the invitation list. https://t.co/ejxN0pSbeO

name: nytimes
text:
RT @ByMikeBaker: The man in this Portland video is Christopher David.

A Navy veteran, he tells us he went to the protests for the first time to ask officers about the constitution.

He said his fingers are broken and he needs surgery.

MORE: https://t.co/W7qAD8R4xJ

text: More than 1000 health care workers in charge of caring for the Indigenous in Brazil have tested positive for the coronavirus, and may have exposed the communities they were supposed to help https://t.co/SBSuUUNXfM
